name: Major Malfunction
description:
Your ship has suffered catastrophic damage, as a result you only have enough power to operate one of your ship's systems at a time.

Switch between charging, moving, shooting and shielding and don't forget to keep an eye on your remaining power.
How many drones can you take down before they land a shot on you?

By MindHawk and Wesje101

Source code: https://github.com/MindHawk/GMTK-2019-Game-Jam
